entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 6 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
